1.0.0.name: wordpress/web-screenshots
1.0.0.description:
With Usage of the wordpress.com inofficial webpage to screenshot function this plugins generates screenshots of websites. For more information check http://bdisco.de/wordpress-plugins/ There are a few options you can use in your shortcode [webscreenshot]:

url: full Url of the webpage which you want to have screenshoted (mandantory)

width: Pixel width of the screenshot (optional, default: 250)

refresh: If you want to reload the screenshot if it wasn't generated on the first call (optional, default: true)

link: link image to given url (optional, default: true)

newpage: open link in new page (optional, default: true)

title: set link title tag (will be used as img alt tag also) (optional, default:'')

All img-tags generated will have a class called "webscreenshot", the link will have a class called "webscreenshot-link" which you can you to perform additional style stu
